DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim evaluate possible effect nocturnal melatonin ingestion upon short-term performance , follow morning . Twelve soccer player Tunisian squad ( 22.9 ±1.3 year , 1.80±0.05 , 72.0±8.8 kg ) volunteer perform three test session , one test session per day . During session , MEL ( 5mg ) , MEL ( 8mg ) placebo ingest , randomize order , nocturnal sleep . The next morning ( 08:00h ) , participant perform follow psycho-cognitive physical test : Hooper 's index , reaction time , vigilance , handgrip strength , squat jump , modify agility test , Wingate anaerobic test ( peak power , mean power fatigue index ) . Rating perceived exertion record immediately WanT , blood lactate measure take 3min recovery . Blood glucose measure 3 min Wingate test .
DOC.criteria: The participant recruit base follow criterion : ( ) paticipants must train 46 day per week average 2 h daily ( ii ) must least 8 year train experience Subjects exclude study present one follow criterion : heart failure , antioxidant supplementation within 3 month study , lowerlimb injury
